title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Tensors, kinematics of a continuum, stress, constitutive equations, material frame invariance, balance laws, linear elastic solids, Newtonian viscous fluid, incompressible simple fluid.

title: Student Opinion
text:
Very mathematical course. Can learn a lot of good mathematics, if taught by a good professor.
If taught by AA, don't take. Not so good teaching. But by daily attending classes and a bit of self study, you can learn things. Choice is yours. If the prof is good, then it is a good course to learn mathematics.
